description:
It`s Mr. Momoneko`s adventure! The life of a cat looks easy until you find out how much work the important Mr. Momoneko does.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoneko-sama no Yuuutsu, na no de / Shitsuren Camera, na no de
Mr. Momoneko`s Melancholy, So Yeah / Lost Love Camera, So Yeah
ももねこさまの憂鬱, なので / 失恋カメラ, なので
